lines.text: Hey, smell my finger.
No.
"BOUGHT me?" You didn't "BUY" me! There's not enough money in the world for you to buy me.
Okay...
You rented me for an hour.

[checking Philip's watch]
Excuse me - 58 minutes and counting.
Actually - it sounds corny as shit, I know - I wouldn't mind holding you for a minute.

[laughs]
"Holding me?" Oh, man! Couldn't we just fuck instead?
You know the rules. For twenty bucks I'll shower while you take care of yourself, and for an extra twenty-five I'll get my hair wet.
I, uh... I... wanna watch you shave your legs.
No problem. That's my specialty.
Mayor wants the gay vote. Everyone's lookin' the other way.
Come on in. We don't bite. Unless you want us to.
Can't I get a beer?
Not unless you grow a dick real soon.
You're still just a piece of tail around here, even if it does come in red pants.
Hey, I'm just sayin' you can tell me anything. I won't freak. I saw The Crying Game. I'm cool with that shit.
Hey. Excuse me. When do the women get here?
You're disappointed, aren't ya? Ah, that's okay. It's never quite as good as you think it's gonna be, but when you think back on it later - and you will - it'll be fuckin' fantastic.
Look, I know this is weird...
You're sick.
...but what's wrong with wanting to know you?
You can know me all you need to for a hundred bucks an hour.
Jesus, one lousy night, you're already following me around. Next thing I know you'll be boiling my rabbit.
Maybe you're just not my type.

[laughs]
Yeah. Yeah, I like that. Keep tellin' yourself that.
No, it didn't "just sorta happen" - you just sorta DID IT!
Yeah, it's me. In the flesh.
